discovery.name: Palacio de los López
discovery.description: The Presidential Palace of Paraguay, known as Palacio de los López, is a neoclassical building that serves as the official workplace of the President. It’s a symbol of government and Paraguayan heritage.
discovery.address: El Paraguayo Independiente y Ayolas, Asunción, Paraguay

discovery.name: Panteón Nacional de los Héroes
discovery.description: The National Pantheon of the Heroes is a mausoleum honoring Paraguay's greatest national heroes. It’s an iconic historical site and a symbol of national pride.
discovery.address: Calle Palma y Chile, Asunción, Paraguay

discovery.name: Represa de Itaipú
discovery.description: One of the largest hydroelectric dams in the world, shared between Paraguay and Brazil. It's a feat of engineering and a major source of electricity.
discovery.address: Avenida Monseñor Rodríguez, Hernandarias, Alto Paraná, Paraguay

discovery.name: Ruinas Jesuíticas de Trinidad y Jesús
discovery.description: These are UNESCO World Heritage sites that preserve the remains of Jesuit missions from the 17th and 18th centuries, such as Trinidad and Jesús de Tavarangue.
discovery.address: Jesús de Tavarangue, a few km from Trinidad, Itapúa, Paraguay

discovery.name: Costanera de Encarnación
discovery.description: A beautiful waterfront promenade along the Paraná River, popular for walking, cycling, and enjoying the beach and sunset.

discovery.name: Salto del Monday
discovery.description: A stunning natural waterfall, over 40 meters high, surrounded by lush forest and part of a protected park.
discovery.address: Área 1, Presidente Franco, Alto Paraná, Paraguay

discovery.name: Iglesia de Yaguarón
discovery.description: A colonial-era church with impressive baroque-style altars and artwork, built in the 18th century by Franciscan missionaries.
discovery.address: Ruta 1 Mariscal Francisco Solano López, Yaguarón, Paraguarí, Paraguay

discovery.name: Museo del Fútbol Sudamericano
discovery.description: A modern museum dedicated to the history and legacy of South American football, showcasing trophies, memorabilia, and interactive exhibits.
discovery.address: Avenida Sudamericana, Luque, Central Department, Paraguay
